title: Natural farming working model | Sustainable Farming | Hydroponic&Vertical farming | Organic manure

tasks.task: Explain the process of hydroponic farming.
subtasks: Describe the dripping system used in hydroponic farming.
Explain how clean soil is added to the water system.
Discuss the use of manure mix and panchagalaya as organic fertilizers.
Describe the process of preparing panchagalaya from fruit, ghee, and seeds.
Mention the benefits of using natural fertilizers over insecticides.

tasks.task: Describe the self-watering system for hydroponic farming.
subtasks: Explain the use of boxes with holes for water plants.
Describe the placement of water-absorbing materials in the boxes.
Discuss the benefits of a self-watering system for long-term care of plants.

tasks.task: Highlight the importance of vertical farming and eco-friendly practices.
subtasks: Mention the decreasing soil fertility and the need for alternative farming methods.
Discuss the benefits of promoting vertical farming for small and marginal farmers.
Emphasize the environmental protection aspects of natural fertilization methods.
